item.title: Human bones found in luggage at Tampa International Airport
item.description: The traveler claimed the items were for rituals.

item.description: Back-to-back 7-Eleven robberies reported in Venice and North Port, police say

item.title: Bones found in bag at TPA
item.description: A traveler at an airport in Florida was accused of having what looked like human remains, including a part of a skull, inside their luggage.

item.title: Suspected car thief arrested in Tampa
item.description: Suspected car thief arrested in Tampa

item.title: Nearly 250 suspects arrested in latest Polk County prostitution, child sex sting
item.description: Detectives brought a total of 89 felony and 282 misdemeanor charges during the investigation.

item.title: President Trump to Speak at Charlie Kirk Memorial Service
item.description: Charlie Kirk's funeral will take place at 11 am MST Sunday

item.title: Meet Yuki, ABC7’s Pet of the Week!
item.description: Yuki is a 2-year-old Akita looking for her forever home.

item.title: K-9 locates 93-year-old with dementia who wandered into water
item.description: K9 Zoe and Cpl. Sella help locate 93-year-old with dementia who wandered into water.

item.title: Manatee Sheriff Wells explains open carry after Florida court ruling
item.description: Some restrictions remain on where firearms may be openly carried.

item.title: Watch: Suspected car thief track by chopper
item.description: A sheriff’s Office aviation unit tracked the suspect trying to hide inside a Walmart.

item.title: Spectrum Sailing Camp offers social skills, confidence for children with autism
item.description: The mission is to make sailing available to everyone.

item.title: Mayor talks progress in tour of Bradenton’s wastewater plant
item.description: Bradenton mayor Gene Brown said in an interview that they are working hard to get to a point where they don’t have to bypass any water.

item.title: Investigations continue into south Sarasota County convenience store robberies
item.description: Police say the two Friday morning robberies appear to be connected.

item.title: The heat is on for last summer weekend
item.description: We are doing to see a hot weekend with highs in the low 90s and the heat index approaching 100 degrees each afternoon.
